title: Blackletter Harlequin Historical Romances
content:
Business news yesterday included a report of the sale of Harlequin Enterprises by Torstar to News Corp. for $455 in cash and a picture of current books including this one (cropped)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701002119im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HarlequinHistorical_3666.jpg)
  
I was able to find another title in Terri Bisbin's MacLerie Clan series with more lettering in the identical style. There seems to be a base font for the UC and a swash version. Anyone have any info on the font, or even just some more uppercase letters?  
Thanks.  
Don

Font: 

 Bucanera Soft 

Solved By: 

 [R](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701002119/http:/typophile.com/user/8968 "View user profile.")

author: donshottype

comments.content: It’s all set in [Bucanera Soft](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701002119/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/corradine/bucanera-soft/), which indeed includes a swash font/feature.

And so it is! Many thanks R. Quick work. I went for a walk and when I came back here was your solution.  
Don
Which proves that, when you’re stuck with a problem, it is never a bad thing to just go take a walk. Glad to help, Don!
